message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of a price of $1400000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. After considering my budget and needs, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1300000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking to receive for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $1350000. This is a fair compromise that I believe will satisfy both of our interests.
